title: Online Tutoring
description: Teaching students remotely in subjects you excel at via video and digital tools.
requirements: Subject-matter expertise, reliable computer & internet, video conferencing tools, lesson planning, certification optional.

title: Graphic Design
description: Creating visual content such as logos, flyers, and social media assets for clients.
requirements: Strong design skills, mastery of tools like Adobe Creative Suite or Figma, professional portfolio, basic branding knowledge.

title: Dog Walking
description: Providing exercise and care for pets in your local area.
requirements: Physical fitness, empathy with animals, scheduling tools, local advertising.

title: Print-on-Demand Store
description: Selling custom-designed products (like T-shirts or mugs) without holding inventory.
requirements: Design skills, e-commerce setup, finding a reliable print-on-demand service, marketing strategy.

title: Affiliate Marketing
description: Promoting products online and earning a commission for each sale made through your links.
requirements: Content creation ability, SEO or social media skills, website or channel, knowledge of affiliate platforms.

title: Dropshipping
description: Selling products online where the supplier ships items directly to the customer.
requirements: Product research, e-commerce setup, supplier reliability, marketing, brand building.

title: Build Websites
description: Developing websites for businesses or individuals using coding or CMS tools.
requirements: HTML/CSS/JS or WordPress knowledge, hosting/domain setup, portfolio or client pitch skills.

title: Email Marketing
description: Crafting and sending newsletters and campaigns to engage subscribers.
requirements: Copywriting skills, familiarity with platforms like MailChimp, subscriber acquisition, analytics.

title: Virtual Assistant
description: Supporting business operations remotely through tasks like email management and scheduling.
requirements: Organization, communication, familiarity with admin tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Trello).

title: Transcription
description: Converting audio into written text accurately and efficiently.
requirements: Fast typing (≈60 WPM), good listening skills, quality headphones, transcription software.

title: Freelance Writing
description: Creating articles, copy, or content for clients across industries.
requirements: Strong writing/editing, SEO basics, portfolio or sample writing, familiarity with freelance platforms.

title: Online Surveys
description: Filling out surveys and small tasks for reward platforms.
requirements: Access to reputable platforms, patience for micro-tasks, consistent effort.

title: User Testing
description: Evaluating websites/apps by providing usability feedback.
requirements: Ability to articulate experience, stable internet, willingness to test diverse platforms.

title: Social Media Management
description: Managing clients’ social profiles, creating content and planning engagement.
requirements: Understanding of social platforms, content creation tools, scheduling software, client communication.

title: SEO Consulting
description: Advising businesses on how to optimize content for search engines.
requirements: Knowledge of SEO, analytics tools experience, keyword research capability, result-oriented mindset.
